section.title: DBCleanerTool
section.para: It is a special service for data removal from database. The section shortly describes the principles of work DBCleanerTool under all databases.

section.title: Methods of DBCleanerTool

note.para: Code that invokes the methods of DBCleanerTool must have JCRRuntimePermissions.MANAGE_REPOSITORY_PERMISSION permission.

section.para: There are several methods of DBCleanerTool :

row.entry: Clean JCR tables, can't contain some indexes or constraints.
Executes SQL scripts for finishing clean operations if needed.
Tries to restore previous data by renaming tables.

section.para: Different approaches are used for database cleaning depending on database and JCR configuration.
